description: The silence returns in A Quiet Place: Day One, now streaming on Netflix from November 14. Starring Lupita Nyong’o and Joseph Quinn, the apocalyptic prequel explores humanity’s first terrifying encounter with sound-hunting creatures. With emotional storytelling, intense visuals, and an IMDb rating of 6.8/10, it’s a must-watch for fans of survival thrillers and atmospheric horror.
title: A Quiet Place: Day One OTT Release Date: Everything You Need to Know About the Apocalyptic Thriller

description: Anurag Kashyap’s Nishaanchi (2025) delivers a gripping crime thriller with stellar performances from Aishwarya Thackeray and Vedika Pinto. Available for rent on Prime Video India, the film blends suspense, drama, and emotional tension, earning a 6.2 IMDb rating. The film is now available for rent on Prime Video India and offers a suspense-filled cinematic experience.
title: Anurag Kashyap’s Nishaanchi OTT Release Date Confirmed: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Blue Origin’s New Glenn launch was postponed on November 9, 2025, because of heavy clouds at Cape Canaveral. The rocket was carrying NASA’s twin ESCAPADE orbiters to study Mars’s atmosphere. The delay came a day before the FAA’s new daytime launch ban during a federal shutdown. The next attempt is scheduled for November 12.
title: Bad Weather Delays Blue Origin’s New Glenn Launch of NASA’s Mars Mission

description: Dude is a Tamil drama film which stars Pradeep Ranganathan and Mamitha Baiju in the key roles. The movie is releasing on Netflix on Nov. 14th, 2025.
title: Dude OTT Release Date: Know When and Where to Watch Pradeep Ranganathan Starrer Tamil Movie

description: NASA’s ESCAPADE mission will launch twin mini-satellites, Blue and Gold, to Mars aboard Blue Origin’s New Glenn. The probes will study how solar wind stripped away Mars’s atmosphere and water, helping scientists understand the Red Planet’s lost climate and its transformation into the dry world we see today.
title: NASA’s ESCAPADE Mission Will Send Twin Probes to Uncover Mars’s Atmospheric Secrets

description: Peking University engineers built a three-layer microfluidic cooling device that manages 3,000 W/cm² heat flux with just 0.9 W/cm² pumping power. Using manifold, microjet, and microchannel layers, it dissipates heat efficiently, promising a leap toward cooler, smaller, and more power-efficient chip designs.
title: Peking University’s 3-Layer Cooling System Handles Record Chip Heat Loads

description: Real Kashmir Football Club is an upcoming Sony LIV sports drama inspired by the real-life journey of the first professional football team from Kashmir. Starring Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub and Manav Kaul, the series captures the club’s rise from a conflict-torn valley to national recognition.
title: Real Kashmir Football Club OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Telusu Kada is a light-hearted Telugu romance drama that stars Siddhu Jonalagadda in the lead role. The film will begin streaming from Nov. 14th, 2025, only on Netflix.
title: Telusu Kada OTT Release Date: Know When and Where to Watch This Telugu Drama Online

description: Hosted by the famous TV host Forrest Galante, Vantara Sanctuary Stories, now on Jio Hotstar.
title: Vantara Sanctuary Stories Now Available for Streaming on JioHotstar: What You Need to Know

description: NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope has detected phosphine (PH₃) in the atmosphere of the ancient brown dwarf Wolf 1130C, about 54 light-years away in Cygnus. This marks the first confirmed detection of a phosphorus-bearing gas in such a metal-poor object. The finding surprises astronomers, as phosphine was previously undetected in similar brown dwarfs, challenging existing models of phosphorus chemistry and hinting at unknown atmospheric or stellar processes at work.
title: Webb Finds Phosphorus-Bearing Gas in an Ancient Brown Dwarf

description: The Apple Watch Series 11 arrives with minimal changes compared to Series 10, at least on paper. However, that’s not the case in real-world usage. It retains the familiar, premium design but improves durability, performance, and battery life. There are new important health features, while watchOS 26 adds polish and Apple Intelligence. But are these upgrades enough to justify spending a premium on this smartwatch? Here’s our review.
title: Apple Watch Series 11 Review: The Winning Formula, Refined

description: Bharti Airtel has discontinued its Rs 189 voice-only prepaid plan, making Rs 199 the new minimum recharge option. The move reportedly reflects the telecom industry’s shift towards data-centric plans. The Rs 199 plan offers unlimited calls, 100 SMS per day, 2GB of data for 28 days, and perks like Hello Tunes and a Perplexity Pro AI subscription. While suitable for smartphone users, the change raises costs for rural and budget-conscious customers who relied on simple, affordable voice-only options.
title: Airtel Quietly Discontinues Rs 189 Voice-Only Plan in India, Rs 199 Becomes New Minimum Recharge

description: The best laptops under Rs. 50,000 in India can combine strong performance, modern design, and offer good value for students as well as professionals. Some of the top picks in this category include the Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3 with a Ryzen 5 chip, Acer Aspire Lite with Intel’s 13th Gen Core i3, Asus Vivobook Go 14 for portability, Dell Inspiron 15 featuring a 13th Gen Core i5, and the Moto Book 60 with a vivid OLED display. Each offers solid performance, fast SSD storage, and reliable battery life for everyday use.
title: Best Laptops Under Rs 50,000 in India: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3, Acer Aspire Lite, Moto Book 60 and More

description: DigiLocker acts as a cloud-based service for storing government-issued documents. The DigiLocker app and website allow you to digitise your documents and make them available to you at all times. These digitised documents are considered to be at par with original physical ones and are accepted by authorities. Here is a step-by-step guide on how you can fetch or upload documents to DigiLocker.
title: DigiLocker: How to Store Your Aadhaar, PAN and Other Documents Safely on Your Phone

description: Samsung India has expanded its Care+ service to include extended warranty plans for home appliances, covering refrigerators, washing machines, air conditioners, microwave ovens and smart TVs. The plans offer one to four years of additional coverage, starting at Rs. 2 per day, and provide access to certified engineers, genuine Samsung parts, multilingual support, and app-based service tracking.
title: Samsung Care+ Service Expanded to Include Extended Warranty Plans for Home Appliances

description: Paytm has redesigned its mobile app with a cleaner interface and new artificial intelligence (AI) features to make payments and financial management easier. The update adds tools to track spending, categorise transactions, and search payment history more efficiently. Users can now view all linked bank balances, use Magic Paste for faster transfers, and earn digital gold coins with every payment.
title: Paytm Revamps App With Cleaner Interface, Adds New AI-Powered Features

description: Honor X80 is said to be in the works with a 10,000mAh battery. It is tipped to come with a 6.8-inch LTPS display with 1.5K resolution and rounded corners. It could run on a Snapdragon 7 series chipset. The Honor X80 will succeed the Honor X70, which carries an 8,300mAh cell. The handset will likely be launched next year.
title: Honor X80 Tipped to Get 10,000mAh Battery, Snapdragon Chipset, More

description: Vivo Y500 Pro has been launched in China. The new device is available in four colour options with a 6.67-inch OLED display. It features a 200-megapixel Samsung HP5 sensor and houses a 7,000mAh battery with support for 90W fast charging.
title: Vivo Y500 Pro With MediaTek Dimensity 7400 Chipset, 7,000mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications

description: The Xiaomi 17 Ultra, reportedly in development, is expected to debut as the top-end model in the Xiaomi 17 series with the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. According to a tipster, it will feature next-generation LOFIC camera technology, a 200-megapixel periscope lens, and a large f/1.6 primary sensor for improved low-light performance. The phone may include a 6.9-inch 2K OLED 120Hz display, 100W fast charging, and multiple 50-megapixel sensors, focusing heavily on advanced imaging.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra Tipped to Launch With LOFIC Camera Technology, 200-Megapixel Periscope Lens

description: Arc Raiders has reached a peak concurrent player count of over 450,000 on Steam. The extraction shooter is currrently among the most played games on the platform. The game has also reportedly sold over 2.5 million copies since launch.
title: Arc Raiders Reportedly Sells 2.5 Million Copies, Hits 450,000 Concurrent Players on Steam

description: The Samsung Galaxy S26 series is expected to go official early next year as the successor to the Galaxy S25 series. In recent weeks, the company has teased major artificial intelligence (AI), performance, and camera upgrades that are in store for its upcoming flagships. According to a recent report, the Galaxy S26 and Galaxy S26+ will come with upgraded triple rear cameras, including a new 12-megapixel telephoto sensor. Both models are expected to get a bump in battery size, too.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26+ Camera and Battery Details Leak; Incremental Upgrades Expected
Google Pixel Watch 4 launches in India, available exclusively online on Flipkart - Smart, Stylish, and Fun

description: The iQOO 15 is set to launch in India on November 26, featuring Android 16-based OriginOS 6 out of the box. A report claims the phone will offer five years of OS upgrades and seven years of security updates, the longest support yet for the brand. It will be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC, paired with LPDDR5x RAM, UFS 4.1 storage, and a Q3 gaming chip. The device will be available in Alpha (black) and Legend (white) colours with a 2K 144Hz display.
title: iQOO 15 to Come With Five Years OS Upgrades, Seven Years Security Update: Report

description: Microsoft is developing a new class of artificial intelligence (AI) agents called “Agentic Users” for enterprise use. Set to launch in November, these agents will act as independent digital users within Microsoft 365, capable of attending meetings, editing documents, and communicating across Teams and email. Each agent will have its own identity, access rights, and collaboration abilities.
title: Microsoft Is Developing New AI Agents for Enterprises That Behave as Independent Users

description: WhatsApp is reportedly rolling out a new Media Hub feature for a limited number of users on WhatsApp Web and WhatsApp for Mac. This feature works like a centralised hub for all media shared across chats. This feature could help in content discovery and improve overall media management on the platform. It allows users to find recent media files by searching with the name of the contact who shared the file, or caption or the date it was sent.
title: WhatsApp Rolling Out Media Hub to Easily Browse Shared Images, Videos and More Shared Across Chat: Report

description: Apple is developing several new features linked to satellite connectivity for the iPhone, as per a seasoned journalist. The Cupertino-based tech giant first introduced satellite-based emergency calls and messages in 2022 with the iPhone 14 series. Subsequent iPhone models have all featured support for it, along with several quality-of-life upgrades. However, users may reportedly soon also be able to use Apple Maps and share photos when connected to a satellite network.
title: Apple Reportedly Developing Satellite-Powered Maps, Photo Sharing via Satellite on iPhone

description: Apple will reportedly pay Google around $1 billion annually to use a customised Gemini AI model to power Siri’s upcoming features, according to Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman. The deal, which Apple is said to be keeping under wraps to avoid public association with its rival, suggests a deeper reliance on Gemini than previously expected.
title: Apple Will Reportedly Pay Google $1 Billion Per Year to Use Gemini Model for Siri

description: Grand Theft Auto 5 is reportedly coming to PS Plus Game Catalogue this month. According to a leak, the game will join PlayStation Plus on November 18. This would be the third time GTA 5 joins PS Plus Game Catalogue.
title: Grand Theft Auto 5 Reportedly Coming to PS Plus Game Catalogue in November

description: Motorola Edge 70 Ultra could launch soon as a successor to last year's Motorola Edge 50 Ultra. Ahead of any official confirmation, a leak has suggested its possible specifications. The upcoming handset could feature an OLED screen with 1.5K resolution. It is said to come with the unannounced Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset. It is tipped to feature a periscope telephoto camera. It is said to retain the slim design of the Motorola Edge 70, and this would put the handset in the same camp as the Galaxy S25 Edge and iPhone 17 Air.
title: Motorola Edge 70 Ultra Key Specifications Leaked Online: Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC, OLED Display, and More

description: OnePlus Ace 6 Pro Max is expected to go official in China this month. A tipster suggests that the purported handset could be introduced as the OnePlus Ace 6T instead, bringing back the ‘T’ moniker for the first time since the OnePlus 8T.  It may be powered by the unannounced Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset. OnePlus is also rumoured to partner with Genshin Impact to introduce a special edition of the purported OnePlus Ace 6T.
title: OnePlus Ace 6 Pro Max Could Launch as OnePlus Ace 6T; Tipped to Come With Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC

description: Samsung is expected to launch the Galaxy S26 series in late January 2026, with sales beginning in early February. The phones will reportedly feature Samsung’s 2nm Exynos 2600 or Qualcomm’s 3nm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipsets, depending on the region. Earlier concerns of a delay were reportedly resolved after Samsung replaced the underperforming Edge model with the revived S26+. The decision followed weak Galaxy S25 Edge sales, which were 74 percent lower than the S25+, prompting a lineup adjustment.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series Launch Timeline Leaked Again, May Arrive in January

description: Unique Identification Authority of India (UIDAI) announced the launch of a new Aadhaar app on Sunday. The new app is aimed at helping Indian citizens securely store their Aadhaar card and even share it with others. The app is available on both Android’s Google Play and iOS’ App Store. The app works alongside the mAadhaar app, which functions more as a place to verify details, download the ID, and order a physical Aadhaar card.
title: UIDAI Launches New Aadhaar App for Android and iOS Users, Makes It Easier to Store and Share ID

description: Apple is reportedly planning its first major MacBook Pro redesign since 2021, featuring OLED displays, touch support, and a thinner chassis. According to Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman, the overhaul will be exclusive to the high-end M6 Pro and M6 Max models, expected to launch between late 2026 and early 2027. The entry-level version will likely retain the current miniLED design for another generation. In India, the M5-based MacBook Pro starts at Rs. 1,69,900, offering a more affordable option for professional users.
title: Apple M6 Pro, M6 Max MacBook Pro Models to Feature OLED Display, Slimmer Design and Touch Support by 2027: Mark Gurman

description: Realme GT 8 Pro Aston Martin F1 Edition has been launched in China. This special edition smartphone has similar hardware features to the regular Realme GT 8 Pro, but it boasts a distinct design with Aston Martin's signature green colour with a silver-wing logo on the rear panel. The Realme GT 8 Pro Aston Martin F1 Edition ships with a custom retail box and other accessories. It is equipped with a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC and a 7,000mAh battery.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro Aston Martin F1 Limited Edition Launched With Racing-Inspired Design, 7,000mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: The Oppo Find X9 series is scheduled to be launched in India on November 18. Similar to its global counterparts, the lineup is expected to comprise two models — Oppo Find X9 and Oppo Find X9 Pro. Ahead of its debut, the company has listed both of the upcoming Find X9 series handsets on its website, revealing the RAM and storage configurations, as well as their possible colourways. The Find X9 series, notably, was introduced in China on October 16.
title: Oppo Find X9 Series Storage Options, Colourways Revealed Ahead of India Launch

description: Oppo Reno 15 series will be launched in China next week, the company announced on Monday. The upcoming lineup is expected to comprise three models — Oppo Reno 15, Reno 15 Pro, and a new Reno 15 Mini variant. The standard Reno 15 and Reno 15 Pro have also been listed on the company’s online shopping platform ahead of debut, which reveals the RAM and storage variants and possible colourways of the handsets.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Series China Launch Date Announced; to Come With Up to 16GB of RAM, 1TB Storage
